parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The description of the host group. The description can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: HostGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the host group. The name can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host on which you want to create a host group.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host on which you want to create a host group.

**

**For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see **Regions and zones[.](~~40654~~)
